channel.title: Pete Naish's Blog
channel.description: Front-end dev focused tips and workflow improvements

item.title: Hey
item.description: I've been a professional front-end developer since 2009. Before that, I was a front-end hobbyist and amateur tinkerer, and I've always enjoyed using computers. Back when I was a young teenager, my dad brought home our first 'proper' computer. I wreaked havoc on it, blindly installing shit like BonziBuddy and...
